title: AMD Inside?
body: <p><a href="http://www.businessweek.com/magazine/content/04_38/b3900048_mz011.htm" title="The perennial underdog is challenging Intel with a new class of microprocessors">Business Week</a> has a nice article talking about AMD's struggle.  It also talks about Dell being the lone holdout as far as the big PC makers are concerned.  Apparently Intel gives Dell millions of dollars towards marketing and stuff so it'll take a decent market-share slip for them to adopt.  They've always been late-adopters anyways so I guess it would be expected.</p>
